1 // ~~~~~~~~ The portal
  2 
  3 if (!capsule) {
  4     /** @namespace */
  5     capsule = {};
  6 }
  7 
  8 (function($, capsule){
  9 
 10 if(typeof console === "undefined") {
 11     console = { log: function() { } };
 12 }
 13 
 14 var Events = capsule.Events;
 15 
 16 /**
 17  * A Capsule portal
 18  * @class
 19  */
 20 capsule.Portal = function(selector, settings) {
 21     this.options = $.extend({
 22         pages: true,
 23         admin: false,
 24         blank: "about:blank",
 25         lang: 'en',
 26         centerWidth: 32,
 27         dragdrop: true,
 28         messages: {}
 29     }, settings);
 30     $.extend(this.options.messages, {
 31         defaultPage: "Page",
 32         removePage: "Remove Page",
 33         removePageConfirm: "Really remove the page?",
 34         close: "close"
 35     });
 36     this.root = $(selector);
 37     this.portlets = [];
 38     this.portletsById = {};
 39     this.pages = [];
 40     this.pagesById = {};
 41 
 42     var self = this;
 43     if(window.addEventListener) {
 44         window.addEventListener('message', function(e){
 45             self.onMessage(e);
 46         }, false);
 47     } else {
 48         window.attachEvent('onmessage', function(e) {
 49             self.onMessage(e);
 50         });
 51         document.onselectstart = function(){return false;};
 52         document.ondragstart = function(){return false;};
 53     }
 54 
 55     this.build();
 56 
 57     // Listen for state changes in pages or portlets
 58     Events.bind([Events.PAGECHANGE, Events.PORTLETCHANGE], function(e, data){
 59         self.save();
 60     });
 61     Events.bind(Events.NEWPORTLET, function(e, data){
 62         self.createPortlet(data.url, null, null, data.noFeedback, data.widgetName);
 63     });
 64 }
 65 
 66 Portal.prototype = {
 67 
 68     admin: function() {
 69         return this.options.admin;
 70     },
 71 
 72     lang: function() { // TODO: get rid of?
 73         return this.options.lang;
 74     },
 75 
 76     message: function(key) {
 77         return this.options.messages[key] || key;
 78     },
 79 
 80     blank: function() {
 81         return this.options.blank;
 82     },
 83 
 84     centerWidth: function() {
 85         return this.options.centerWidth;
 86     },
 87 
 88     sideWidth: function() {
 89         // The rest is used for spacing
 90         return Math.floor((96 - this.centerWidth()) / 2);
 91     },
 92 
 93     setSize: function() {
 94         $('.capsule-container').css('min-height', null);
 95         var h = $(document).height() - $('#head').height() - 55;
 96         $('.capsule-container').css('min-height', h+'px');
 97     },
 98 
 99     // Return the data as a Javascript object. If the data passed was a string
100     // it means it's the URL where to fetch the actual data.
101     data: function() {
102         if (typeof this.options.data == 'string') {
103             return $.parseJSON(
104                 $.ajax({
105                     url: this.options.data,
106                     async: false,
107                     dataType: 'json'
108                 }).responseText
109             );
110         }
111         return this.options.data;
112     },
113 
114     loadContent: function(repositoryUrl) {
115         this.reloadRepository = function() {
116             this.loadPortletRepository(repositoryUrl);
117         };
118         this.reloadRepository();
119     },
120 
121     build: function() {
122         // Build portal content
123         var port = this;
124         if (this.options.pages) {
125             this.pagesElt = $("<ul></ul>").addClass("capsule-pages")
126                 .append($("<li></li>")
127                             .addClass("capsule-addPage")
128                             .append($("<a></a>")
129                                 .attr("id", "addPage")
130                                 .click(function(){
131                                     port.addPage(); // TODO: Use an event
132                                 })
133                                 .text("+")))
134                 .appendTo(this.root);
135             this.root.append('<br style="clear:both" />');
136         }
137         this.content = $("<div><div>").addClass("capsule-content").appendTo(this.root);
138         var pages = this.data();
139         $(pages).each( function() {
140             if(this.columns.length != 3) {
141                 return;
142             }
143             var page = new capsule.Page(this.id, port, {
144                 name: this.name,
145                 color: this.color,
146                 numberOfColumns: this.numberOfColumns,
147                 locked: this.locked
148             });
149             $(this.columns).each(function(i) {
150                 if (this.portlets) {
151                     $(this.portlets.reverse()).each(function() {
152                         page.addPortlet(this.id, {
153                             column: i + 1,
154                             locked: this.locked,
155                             url: this.url,
156                             noFeedback: this.noFeedback,
157                             name: this.name
158                         });
159                     });
160                 }
161             });
162         });
163         if (this.pages.length) {
164             this.pages[0].select();
165         }
166 
167         var _this = this;
168         $('.page').each(function() {
169             var freeColumns = $('.capsule-container', this);
170             _this.bindDragDrop(freeColumns);
171         });
172 
173         $('.capsule-pages').sortable({
174             items: '.pagetab',
175             axis: 'x',
176             stop: function(e, p) {
177                 _this.pages = [];
178                 $('.capsule-pages .pagetab a').each(function(){
179                     _this.pages.push(_this.pagesById[$(this).attr('id')]);
180                 });
181                 _this.save();
182             }
183         });
184 
185         this.setSize();
186         $(window).bind('resize', this.setSize);
187     },
188 
189     bindDragDrop: function(sortableElement) {
190         // Drag&Drop
191         var self = this;
192         var startSorting = function(e, p) {
193             var placeholderHeight = 0;
194             if($(p.item).hasClass("capsule-library-widget")){
195                 placeholderHeight = 100;
196                 $(p.helper).removeClass("new-widget-helper");
197             }
198             else {
199                 self.sortId = p.helper[0].id;
200                 var frame = $('iframe', p.helper);
201                 frame.attr('url', self.blank());
202                 placeholderHeight = frame.height();
203             }
204             p.placeholder.height(placeholderHeight);
205         };
206 
207         var stopSorting = function(e, p) {
208             var portlet;
209             if ($(p.item).hasClass("capsule-library-widget")){
210 
211                 // Adding a new widget, not dragging an existing one.
212                 var widgetSelector = $(p.item.prevObject.prevObject); // Is there a better way to find this?
213                 portlet = widgetSelector.data("widget");
214 
215                 var destinationHelper = $(p.item);
216                 var column = destinationHelper.parent().index();
217                 var position = destinationHelper.index();
218                 destinationHelper.remove();
219 
220                 self.createPortlet(portlet.url, column, position, portlet.noFeedback, portlet.name);
221                 return;
222             }
223 
224             portlet = self.portletsById[self.sortId];
225             if (!portlet.loadfailure) portlet.init();
226 
227             Events.trigger("Portlet_dragdrop_stop", { portlet: portlet });
228             setTimeout(function(){
229                 Events.trigger("Portlet_stateChange", {});
230             }, 500);
231         };
232 
233         if (this.options.dragdrop) {
234             sortableElement.sortable({
235                 items: '.capsule-portlet',
236                 handle: '.capsule-portlet-header',
237                 cursor: 'move',
238                 distance: 10,
239                 connectWith: sortableElement,
240                 placeholder: 'placeholder',
241                 start: startSorting,
242                 stop: stopSorting
243             });
244             }
245     },
246 
247     save: function() {
248         /** Rebuild model */
249         var definition = {};
250         definition.pages = [];
251         var port = this;
252         this.content.find('.page').each(function() {
253             var page = {};
254             page.id = $(this).attr('id').replace("_content", "");
255             if (page.id == "addPage") return;
256             if (port.pagesById[page.id]) {
257                 page.name = port.pagesById[page.id].name();
258                 page.numberOfColumns = port.pagesById[page.id].numberOfColumns;
259             } else {
260                 page.name = {};
261                 page.name[port.lang()] = $(this).find(".tabName").text();
262                 page.numberOfColumns = $('#' + page.id + '_content').find(".pageLayoutSelector span.selected").index() + 1;
263             }
264             page.color = capsule.Utils.colors.toHex($(this).css('backgroundColor'));
265             page.locked = $(this).is('.locked');
266             page.columns = [];
267             $('#' + page.id + '_content .capsule-container').each(function() {
268                 var column = {};
269                 column.portlets = [];
270                 $('.capsule-portlet', this).each(function() {
271                     if(!$(this).is('.spacer')) {
272                         var portlet = {};
273                         portlet.id = $(this).attr('id');
274                         var currentPortlet = port.portletsById[portlet.id];
275                         portlet.url = currentPortlet.url();
276                         portlet.name = currentPortlet.name();
277                         if (currentPortlet.options.noFeedback && currentPortlet.options.noFeedback != "null") {
278                             var noFeedback = _(currentPortlet.options.noFeedback).clone();
279                             if (noFeedback.height) {
280                                 noFeedback.height = "" + noFeedback.height;
281                             }
282                             portlet.noFeedback = noFeedback;
283                         }
284                         if (port.admin()) portlet.locked = $(this).is('.locked');
285                         column.portlets.push(portlet);
286                     }
287                 });
288                 page.columns.push(column);
289             });
290             definition.pages.push(page);
291         });
292         if (this.options.onChange) {
293             this.options.onChange(definition);
294         }
295     },
296 
297     addPage: function(){
298         // Generate unique id
299         var randomId = (+ new Date()) + '-' + Math.floor((Math.random()*89999)+10000);
300 
301         // Generate page name
302         var pageName = this.message("defaultPage") + " ";
303         var index = 1;
304         var found = true;
305         while (found === true) {
306             if (this.pages.length === 0) found = false;
307             for (var i = 0; i < this.pages.length; i++) {
308                 found = false;
309                 if (this.pages[i].name[this.lang()] === pageName + index) {
310                     found = true;
311                     index++;
312                     break;
313                 }
314             }
315         }
316 
317         var names = {};
318         names[this.lang()] = pageName + index;
319         var pagey = new capsule.Page(
320             randomId,
321             this,
322             { name: names }
323         );
324         pagey.select();
325         capsule.PageEditPane.toggle( pagey );
326 
327         this.bindDragDrop( $("#" + pagey.id + "_content .capsule-container") );
328         this.save();
329     },
330 
331     createPortlet: function(url, column, position, noFeedback, name) {
332         var page = this.pagesElt ?
333                    this.pagesById[this.pagesElt.find('.selected a').attr('id')] :
334                    this.pages[0];
335         if (page) {
336             page.addPortlet(new Date().getTime(), {
337                 column: column || 1,
338                 locked: false,
339                 url: url,
340                 noFeedback: noFeedback,
341                 position: position || 0,
342                 name: name
343             }).init();
344             $('.page.selected .capsule-container').sortable('refresh');
345             Events.trigger("Page_stateChange", { id: page.id });
346         } else {
347             console.log("Error: page is null");
348         }
349         return false;
350     },
351 
352     onMessage: function(e) {
353         // Retrieve origin portlet
354         var portlet = null;
355         $(this.portlets).each(function() {
356             if (this.window == e.source) {
357                 portlet = this;
358                 return;
359             }
360         });
361         var message = $.parseJSON(e.data);
362         if (!portlet) {
363             console.log("/!\\ Portal recevied " + message.type + " but we can't find the sender: " + e.data);
364             return;
365         }
366         console.log("Portal recevied " + message.type + " from " + portlet.id);
367         if (portlet['on' + message.type]) {
368             portlet['on' + message.type](message.data);
369         }
370     }
371 
372 };
373 
374 })(jQuery, capsule);
375
